column5: Experience the quiet and relaxation of the Texas countryside while gathering with friends and/or family. Lovingly named Mi Sueno (“My Dream”) this home is ideal for small to large overnight gatherings of 10-20 people. Mi Sueno is located just outside of the small town of Sealy, TX upon 40 acres of rolling Texas land. The villa itself has 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathrooms, gourmet kitchen with Viking appliances, 10 gathering spaces as well as sleeping rooms for up to 16 people.
column8: Beautiful Texas Villa For Family/Weekend Getaways
